unparsed_output: nswer": "EDLP pricing can cause: -Short term profit losses -Share losses as retailer's adjust. While offering the consumer better pricing, \"value\" may be affected by: -Fewer choices (less SKU's/manufacturer, fewer manufacturers) -Fewer consumer driven advantages packing upgrades -colors/styles/sizes, etc.. Longer term, EDLP can work for manufacturers who: Are the leaders in the category and can sustain short term profit losses -Continue to cost reduce overhead -Invest in brand differentiation (advertising, product innovation)"}
